title: Enigma Bikes roll out Escape FB Ti Gravel Bike and all-new Eolus Hardtail Ti Mountain Bike
content:
Titanium and steel bike manufacturers, Enigma Bikes, recently unveiled two new off-road framesets at the Bespoked UK Handmade Bicycle Show; the Escape Flat Bar Gravel Bike, and the Eolus Hardtail.
